languages.text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
The wielder's melee attacks deal +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}% more damage.

Атаки персонажа в ближнем бою наносят на {uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}% больше урона.

languages.text:
每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成伤害时，都会获得{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}临时生命值{/g}。

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成伤害时，都会获得{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}点{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}临时生命值{/g}。
装备者的近战攻击造成的伤害提高{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}%。

每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}。
装备者的所有近战攻击造成额外伤害，等同于{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}。

Атаки персонажа в ближнем бою наносят на {uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}% больше урона.

При нанесении урона атакой в ближнем бою персонаж получает +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
Атаки персонажа в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} наносят +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} урона дополнительно.

languages.text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}によるダメージを受けるたびに、+{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}の一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力を負う。
使用者は近接攻撃で、+{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}%の追加ダメージを与えられる。
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
The wielder's melee attacks deal +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}% more damage.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}によるダメージを受けるたびに、<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g} + 3 × ベネボレンティアレベル)</u>の一時的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を負う。
使用者の近接攻撃で、<u>({g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的負傷{/g} / 2)</u>ダメージが追加で付与される。

使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたびに、+{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}の一時的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を負う。
使用者の近接攻撃で、+{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}ダメージが追加で付与される。

languages.text:
Cada vez que el portador cause daño con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, gana +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.
Los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo del portador infligen un +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} % de daño adicional.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
The wielder's melee attacks deal +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}% more damage.

traits.locale_text:
Cada vez que el portador cause daño con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, gana +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.
Los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo del portador infligen un +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} % de daño adicional.

Cada vez que el portador cause {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, obtiene +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.
Los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo del portador causan +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} de daño.

Cada vez que el portador cause daño con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, obtiene +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.
Los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo del portador causan +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} de daño.

languages.text:
Verursacht der Träger Schaden mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g}, erhält er +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.
Die Nahkampfangriffe des Trägers verursachen +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} % mehr Schaden.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
The wielder's melee attacks deal +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}% more damage.

traits.locale_text:
Verursacht der Träger Schaden mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g}, erhält er +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.
Die Nahkampfangriffe des Trägers verursachen +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} % mehr Schaden.

Immer wenn der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} verursacht, erhält er +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.
Die Nahkampfangriffe des Trägers verursachen zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} Schaden.

languages.text:
Quand l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, il gagne +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.
Les attaques de mêlée de l'utilisateur infligent +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} % de dégâts supplémentaires.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer deals damage with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g}, they gain +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.
The wielder's melee attacks deal +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}% more damage.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts via une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g}, il bénéficie de +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}FOR{/g} + 3 × niveau Benevolentia)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.
Les attaques de mêlée de l'utilisateur infligent +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} / 2)</u> points de dégâts supplémentaires.

Quand l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, il gagne +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.
Les attaques de mêlée de l'utilisateur infligent +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} % de dégâts supplémentaires.

Chaque fois que l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} via une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g}, il bénéficie de +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.
Les attaques de mêlée de l'utilisateur infligent +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} points de dégâts supplémentaires.

languages.text:
Kullanan kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısıyla{/g} hasar verdiğinde +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
Kullanan kişinin yakın dövüş saldırıları, +%{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} daha fazla hasar verir.

The wielder's melee attacks deal +{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec}% more damage.

Kullanan kişi, bir {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısıyla{/g} hasar verdiğinde +{uip|THP|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
Kullanan kişinin yakın dövüş saldırıları, +%{uip|Damage|fb13409a1d7b4784b229adddf99d59ec} daha fazla hasar verir.
